name: @rainstormy/preset-eslint-jsx
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration intended to be used as a foundation for any web project that uses the JSX syntax for components.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base: This ESLint preset ships with type definitions for ESLint presets and their configurable options.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-jsx-a11y: This ESLint plugin covers the accessibility of JSX components.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-react: This ESLint plugin covers JSX components.

devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.eslint: ESLint is a peer dependency of `@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base`.
